issue.title: [C++] arrow/dataset/file_base.cc fails to compile with internal compiler error with "Visual Studio 15 2017 Win64" generator
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-8510](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8510). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
I discovered this while running the release verification on Windows. There was an obscuring issue which is that if the build fails, the verification script continues. I will fix that

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8510?focusedCommentId=17086686) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
This doesn't occur in the UNITY build

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8510?focusedCommentId=17090088) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
I made this a blocker for the next release since it doesn't seem acceptable to require the unity build to be able to build on VS 2017

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8510?focusedCommentId=17134357) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
